summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingAnua Niacinamide 5 TXA Brightening Pad is a round-shaped pad containing 5% Niacinamide and Tranexamic Acid to help brighten the appearance of skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsEasy-to-use pads infused with the jey ingredients of ANUA Niacinamide TXA serumShaped to fit perfectly around the eyes to target dullnessBrightens the skin with a high concentration of 50,000ppm NiacinamideKey IngredientsNiacinamide 5%: Helps revitalize and revive dull skinTranexamic Acid (TXA): Targets spot & soothes post-breakout marksPink Vitamin B12, PHA: Improves skin smooth, hydrated skinResearch Results45.70% improvement in skin gloss effect20.63% improvement of under-eye shadow18.40% improvement in enhancing skin clarity3.46% improvement in eye area elasticityItem 2641334How To UseApply to areas of concern after cleansing and leave on for 10-20 minutes like a mask.Gently wipe across the face to smooth your skin.After using, close the lid to prevent pads drying.Can be used every day, both AM & PM.Tip: Use as a quick morning mask while drying your hair.IngredientsWater, Methylpropanediol, Niacinamide, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Arginine, Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Cyanocobalamin, Betaine Salicylate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Madecassoside, Tranexamic Acid, Gluconolactone, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Saururus Chinensis Extract, Rice Ferment Filtrate (Sake), Oligopeptide-2, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Copper Tripeptide-1, Hexapeptide-9, Hexapeptide-11, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Tripeptide-1.
how_to_use: Apply to areas of concern after cleansing and leave on for 10-20 minutes like a mask.Gently wipe across the face to smooth your skin.After using, close the lid to prevent pads drying.Can be used every day, both AM & PM.Tip: Use as a quick morning mask while drying your hair.

reviews.headline: My skin drinks thi
reviews.comments: I love this brand and I love this product. Not harsh on your skin and has an amazing cooling and smooth feeling. My skin visibly looks brighter and has less redness. It's definitely helping with my discolored under eyes as well.

reviews.headline: Gentle Exfoliation & Glow
reviews.comments: These pads are so convenient! They smooth my skin and help with dull spots.

reviews.headline: LOVE THESE
reviews.comments:
I was fortunate to be gifted the Anua Niacinamide 5 TXA Brightening Pads in exchange for an honest review, and after using them consistently for a few weeks, I can confidently say I love them.

The pads are incredibly gentleâ€”there's no harsh texture, so they glide over the skin without irritation. Each one is fully saturated with product, which means I can cover my entire face and still have enough left to treat my neck and chest. I also really appreciate the thoughtful packaging: the flip-top lid and included tweezers make it easy to keep everything clean and hygienic.

Performance-wise, these have been such an effortless addition to my nighttime routine. I use them every evening before bed, and they leave my skin feeling refreshed, hydrated, and with a noticeable glow over time. The formula is gentle enough that I think most skin types would benefit, making it not only a great self-care splurge but also a thoughtful gift.

Overall, these pads are a simple, effective way to give your skin some extra attention with very little effortâ€”and the results speak for themselves.

reviews.headline: Skincare staples
reviews.comments: I have been using these toner pads in conjunction with the masks and I am obsessed with the results. My skin feels so hydrated. My complexion is brighter and more glowy. I have been applying these pads every morning for about 30 minutes. I like that these pads are generously soaked with essence so each pad feel so nice and fresh on the skin. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review

reviews.headline: Contains BHA
reviews.comments: I do like these toner pads. They feel nice and they're not offensive smelling or anything like that. But I recently found out that they contain a BHA. As someone with rosacea I try to avoid a certain skin care ingredients and BHA is one of them. So with that being said, I will not be purchasing these toner pads.  It really should be made more clear that these contain more than one type of exfoliant.

reviews.headline: No more dark spots
reviews.comments:
I've tried a lot of toning and brightening pads over the years, but the Anua Niacinamide 5% + TXA Brightening Pad really stood out to me from the first week I used it. I didn't expect it to become such a staple in my routine, but now it's one of those products I panic about running out of.
Each pad is generously soaked in essence, so you're never dealing with a half-dry sheet, which is a big deal for me. I've used other brands where the last few pads in the jar are basically useless because they've dried out, but with these, every single pad feels fresh and saturated.
soft and smooth application. Works well with sensitive skin 
I decided to start with nighttime use to see how my skin reacted. The first time I swiped one across my face, it felt cooling and instantly hydrating not that tight, tingling feeling you sometimes get from active ingredients. Within seconds, my skin looked a little more awake and fresh, even before I layered on the rest of my routine.
I struggle with uneven tone, especially some stubborn post-acne marks and a bit of dullness. By day four or five, I started noticing my skin tone looking more even, and the overall texture felt smoother. My cheeks, which tend to look a little blotchy, were noticeably calmer and brighter.
Niacinamide has always been my go-to for brightening and improving skin barrier health, while Tranexamic acid is amazing for tackling discoloration and stubborn pigmentation. Together, they seem to work in a really balanced way, there's no harshness and no peeling. 
Another unexpected benefit was how soft my skin started feeling. My overall complexion is brighter, my makeup goes on smoother, and those post-acne spots that usually linger for months have lightened much faster than usual. 
I've experimented with using them in the morning, too, especially on days when I want my skin to look fresh without much effort. They leave this slightly hydrated, plump base that makes my tinted spf looking glowy and nice on the skin 
Overall, I'd describe the Anua Niacinamide 5% + TXA Brightening Pad as one of the most reliable skincare products I've tried in a long time. It delivers visible results without irritation, feels pleasant to use, and fits seamlessly into both morning and evening routines. I'll keep repurchasing it not just for the brightening benefits, but because it keeps my skin balanced, hydrated, and smooth every single day.
simple to use, genuinely effective, and perfect for anyone who wants that natural, even-toned glow without harsh side effects.

This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review

reviews.headline: I'd repurchase
reviews.comments: Yes, yes & yes!!!

reviews.headline: Gentle Yet Powerful Brightening Pads
reviews.comments: These toner pads are a hidden gem for brightening and refining skin texture. Each pad is generously soaked but not dripping, and the fabric is super soft â€” no rough edges at all. I use them in the evening after cleansing, and I love how refreshing they feel. My skin has become more even over time, and I've noticed some stubborn post-acne spots starting to fade. The best part? There's no sting or irritation, even with regular use. It feels like a perfect balance of gentle exfoliation and calming hydration. Definitely worth trying if you're dealing with pigmentation or uneven skin tone. This item was sent to me in exchange for an honest review. These are my true, unbiased thoughts after use.

reviews.headline: Loved this product!
reviews.comments: This product made my skin feel so smooth and glowy.I love it. I use it every night and I've noticed a change in my face.This product has made my dark spots become lighter and slowly fading away my skin has evened out. I loved it would most definitely buy it again.

reviews.headline: Holy Brightening Grail
reviews.comments: The UNUA  Niacinamide 5 TXA Brightening Pads wonderfully hydrating without any heavy residue. The curved pads are easy to apply and shaped for any location on your face. The smell is refreshing and the pads are thin that grasps your skin as soon a they are applied. They are also thin enough to overlap  hard to reach creases like around the nose.  My skin felt instantly refreshed and looked noticeably more brighter the next 15 minutes after removing . I've also seen an improvement in my skin's texture, with a new smoothness and a healthy glow. If you are looking for a skincare product that's full of high quality brightening ingredients, please give them a try. Perfect for using on my African American combination skin type. Another holy grail that's been added to my skincare routine. Best of all, it didn't irritate my sensitive skin at all. I highly recommend this product ! This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Helped fade away some dark spots!!
reviews.comments: I've been using the Niacinamide 5 TXA Brightening Pad for a few weeks and I'm really impressed. The pads are soft, generously soaked, and super easy to use. They give a gentle exfoliation without irritating my skin. The niacinamide and TXA combo has noticeably brightened my complexion and helped fade some dark spots and redness. My skin feels smoother and looks more even-toned. I use it at night after cleansing, and it layers well under serum and moisturizer. There's no sticky residue, and it feels refreshing. It's become a staple in my routineâ€”definitely a game-changer for dull or uneven skin!

reviews.headline: New addition to my rotation âœ¨
reviews.comments:
Before I get started, I just want to say this product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review. I've been using these for a couple of weeks now and I can truly say they're incredible! I really appreciate how the packaging has a built-in pair of tweezers so everything stays nice, tidy, and sanitary. I hate dipping my fingers into a jar, so this makes me feel so much better about grabbing the pads.

As for the pads themselves, they're super soft and feel amazing on my skin. Usually, facial pads like this do an okay job, but these have been such a nice surprise. I love how much product is on each pad too. Whenever I do my skincare, I can use the extra product on my neck and chest, which feels like a little bonus.

I really love this brand's products and I've tried quite a few of them. Their sunscreen is amazing and their face masks are so good too, so I'm really excited to be able to get these at Ulta now. I can't wait to see what other products they come out with so I can add them to my list.

If you're looking for an easy product to add to your routine, this is a great one. It's perfect for nights when you don't feel like doing a full routine. Sometimes I just wash my face, swipe one of these, and that's it. I wake up with super soft, bright, glowing skin.

reviews.headline: Working as it says
reviews.comments: It gave an instant glow. At first, I didn't believe it, but after using it, I changed my opinion; it really does wonders.

reviews.headline: A must have !!
reviews.comments: This Niacinamide 5 TXA Brightening Pad has been such a nice addition to my skincare routine. The pads are very  easy to use and leave my skin feeling clean, smooth, and refreshed without any irritation. I've also noticed that my skin tone has started to look a bit more even and some of the dark spots I have are beginning to fade a bit and it gives my skin a healthy glow without being too heavy or sticky. I use it in the morning before my moisturizer, and it helps my skin look more awake and clear. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Lately, I've been dealing with dark circles from stress and lack of sleep, and nothing really worked until I finally tried the new Anua pads with niacinamide. They feel so cooling and hydrating, with lots of product on each pad. I noticed a visible brightening under my eyes, and even with my sensitive skin, I had no irritation at all. I love using the extra serum on my face and neck too. It's become a staple in my routine, and I've even found that it helps my makeup go on smoother as well

reviews.headline: TXA heaven
reviews.comments: I've used the ANUA 5% TXA pads with Niacinamide nightly for the past 2+ weeks. I used them to brighten my elbows, knees, and on my face + neck. I washed my face with an oil cleanser followed by a cream cleanser, then used these brightening pads. I followed up with either the ANUA rice 70 overnight mask or the peach niacin brightening mask. I saw results after the second use. Now Ive had wax burn on the sides for my face for years and all the vitamin c in the world couldn't help me. These pads are a game changer. They're gentle and effective, exactly what I want in my skincare. I've got to mention the little plastic tweezers that are on the inside of the top. Great way to keep from cross contamination of product. One pad goes a long way because it is saturated with product. You can even see the amount of liquid on the bottom of the jar, so they definitely didn't skim on the quality of the product.

reviews.headline: Skin Looks Better But Pads Could Be Better Quality
reviews.comments: I've been using these brightening pads every evening for the past two weeks and my skin does look noticeably smoother and more even toned. The formula is greatâ€”gentle but effective even on my dry and dehydrated skin. However the pads themselves rip easily when I pull them out of the container which can be frustrating and messy. Once applied though they glide over the skin without irritation and layer well under the rest of my routine. My complexion looks clearer and less dull after consistent use. I just wish the pad material matched the quality of the serum they're soaked in. Would repurchase. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review

reviews.headline: Transformation Of Your Skin
reviews.comments:
I recently added the Anua Niacinamide 5 TXA Brightening Pad to my skincare routine, and I couldn't be happier with the results! These pads are a powerhouse of ingredients designed to brighten and even out skin tone, and they truly deliver.

Each pad is soaked in a nourishing solution featuring 5% niacinamide, renowned for their brightening and anti-inflammatory properties. The moment I swiped one across my face, I felt an instant cooling sensation, making it perfect for a refreshing pick-me-up.

After just a week of consistent use, I noticed a remarkable improvement in my skin's texture and tone. The pads helped reduce the appearance of dark spots and gave my complexion a radiant glow. The gentle exfoliation left my skin feeling smoother without any irritation, which is a must for my sensitive skin.

I also appreciate the convenience of these padsâ€”they're travel-friendly and easy to incorporate into my daily routine. Just swipe, and I'm good to go! 

Moreover, Anua's commitment to clean ingredients gives me confidence that I'm treating my skin responsibly. Overall, the Anua Niacinamide 5 TXA Brightening Pad is a must-have for anyone looking to enhance their skincare routine. It's effective, refreshing, and delivers visible results. I highly recommend it for a brighter, more even-toned complexion!

*This review was collected as part of a promotion*

reviews.headline: Works wonder for under eye
reviews.comments: I naturally have dark circles and my under-eye area is usually dry, but the ANUA Niacinamide 5 TXA Brightening Pads work perfectly to target that area. They're super easy to use and give an instant boost of hydration, leaving my skin feeling soft and refreshed. After using them for the first time they maje  my under eyes look brighter, smoother, and more awake. They also help my makeup go on better without settling into dry patches. I always struggle with concealer application due to my under eye being dry. I love how quick and convenient they are, I love the twisters that it includes it make it easier to get the patches. These pads have definitely become a go to in my routine whenever I want to moisturize and give my tired eyes a little glow up.

reviews.headline: My holy grail
reviews.comments: As someone with sensitive skin and a long history of battling hyperpigmentation, I'm always hesitant with brightening productsâ€”but this Anua Brightening Pad quickly became a staple. The 5% Niacinamide combined with TXA (Tranexamic Acid) worked like magic in calming down my post-acne marks and evening out my skin tone without any irritation. What I appreciate most is how gentle the pads feelâ€”no stinging, no harsh after-effects. I use them after cleansing, and they leave my skin feeling refreshed and hydrated. Over time, my dark spots have visibly faded, and my complexion looks more radiant and balanced. For anyone struggling with pigmentation but afraid of aggressive formulas, this pad is a game-changer.

I've tried a lot of toning and brightening pads over the years, but the Anua Niacinamide 5% + TXA Brightening Pad really stood out to me from the first week I used it. I didn't expect it to become such a staple in my routine, but now it's one of those products I panic about running out of.
Each pad is generously soaked in essence, so you're never dealing with a half-dry sheet, which is a big deal for me. I've used other brands where the last few pads in the jar are basically useless because they've dried out, but with these, every single pad feels fresh and saturated.
soft and smooth application. Works well with sensitive skin 
I decided to start with nighttime use to see how my skin reacted. The first time I swiped one across my face, it felt cooling and instantly hydrating not that tight, tingling feeling you sometimes get from active ingredients. Within seconds, my skin looked a little more awake and fresh, even before I layered on the rest of my routine.
I struggle with uneven tone, especially some stubborn post-acne marks and a bit of dullness. By day four or five, I started noticing my skin tone looking more even, and the overall texture felt smoother. My cheeks, which tend to look a little blotchy, were noticeably calmer and brighter.
Niacinamide has always been my go-to for brightening and improving skin barrier health, while Tranexamic acid is amazing for tackling discoloration and stubborn pigmentation. Together, they seem to work in a really balanced way, there's no harshness and no peeling.

faceoff_positive.headline: No more dark spots

faceoff_negative.comments:
In this jar, there are thin small cloth(?) pads that are half moon shape and about twice the size of an eye pad, as well as a plastic tweezer to help pick them up with. The pads can be used to swipe the serum on the skin , wear two under the eyes (on either side) , or just spot wear on a problem area. As I've been noticing texture and larger pores on my cheeks in the front , I opted to try to wear them there - like large eye pads. These can be worn like a face mask for 10-20 minutes. I use niacinamide serum on the regular and tolerate it well , so I attempted to replace the serum with this. It's advertised to be used every day , both am and pm. However, I only wore in the morning. The first day i used for 20 minutes, but the next day my skin irritated and flushed with a slight burn. I waited another day to recover, then tried again, but for only 10 minutes - unfortunately with the same result. I've done this a cycle a few times and my skin looks nice, glowy, and the texture is better. However the irritation may not be worth it. I am not through the whole jar yet, there are 60 pads total; I'll keep trying , but will only use 1-2x a week.  

**This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review**
faceoff_negative.headline: Brightening Pads
